articles.author: Hannah Roberts
articles.title: Pope Francis reveals box of documents on church’s ‘dark dealings’ - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Pontiff writes of “evil committed by certain priests” in book released Tuesday.
articles.content:
He gave me a large white box, Francis writes. Documents relating to the most difficult and painful situations. Cases of abuse, corruption, dark dealings, wrongdoings.
Everything is in here, Francis … [+1074 chars]
